message.entry: A function handle specified by ''Statistics'' must accept exactly one input argument.
A function handle specified by ''Statistics'' must return a scalar or output with a size of 1 along the first dimension. For other dimensions, the output size must be the same as the input data size.
''Statistics'' value must be a valid statistic name, a function handle, or a cell array containing valid statistics.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
Parameter name must be ''Statistics'' for array input data.
If ''Statistics'' value is ''none'', specifying additional statistics is not supported.
A function handle specified by ''DataVariables'' must return a logical scalar.
''DataVariables'' value must be a variable name, a vector of variable names, variable indices, logical values, a pattern, a function handle, or a vartype subscript.
''Detail'' only applies to the summary when no output argument is specified.
Unable to display counts for categorical ''''{0}'''' because it no longer exists.
Unable to display counts for ''''{0}'''' because ''''{1}'''' has changed.

entry.note: hole is filled with a class name, e.g., ordinal categorical

message.entry: Statistics for applicable variables and row times

entry.note: hole is filled with a class name, e.g., sparse double
